item.description:
Lets kick the summer off right with a long weekend of hikes, BBQ and bonfires!  Saturday and Sunday will each have 2 hiking options - Moderate and advanced.  Moderate hikes will be in the 4 to 5 mile range and the advanced will be around 9miles.  

This will be a great intro-weekend to the Wedeln Ski & Outdoor Club.  If you have never been to our house then this is an ideal weekend to make your first visit. The Wedeln Ski House is located on the Bartlet / N. Conway townline.  The house is tucked away half way up Hurricane Mountain and has hiking and biking trails right out the back side of the house.  Accomadations are only $20 per night, bring your own bedding.

We are still working on the hike and entertainment schedule.  Possible hikes include:

Mt Kearsage

The Moats

Mt. Washington (may have too much snow)

After hiking we will relax around a bonfire and have a cook out.  

More details to come.  Due to the purchase of food we will require a $20 down payment for this weekend. 21+.  Please do not use GPS to find house, ypou will get lost.  Directions will be sent to all attendees.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the house by 6pm on Friday
item.name: White Mountains Hiking Weekend
